attributes.title: This app is horrible!!!
attributes.review: Right when I launched the app my phone went black and never turned on the store told me it was not fixable so I had to buy a whole new phone trust me don’t buy this app!!!!

attributes.title: Not helpful
attributes.review: A president should be more than “antidemocrat” as a platform. Where are his plans? His promises for this next term? The first page said “help us defeat the democrats.” Shameful. Also no follow through on past promises. And no plan to continue.

attributes.title: ✨✨The orange 🍊🍊that’s our president ✨✨
attributes.review: This app is terrible of my children are absolutely terrified of this orange looking man on the screen they’ve been so terrified of him and honestly he looks like an orange oh Em Gee and in my spare time and have you been listening to that song called F DONALD TRUMP

attributes.title: Horrible App. #MakeAppsGreatAgain🥴
attributes.review: It would be a shame if you downloaded it, and registered for all his rallies and didn’t show up. And maybe went to his online shop and filled the cart to maximum capacity!

attributes.title: Too many glitches
attributes.review: I am unable to even open the app and when I do it kicks me out, this app has way to many bugs and glitches

attributes.title: B a l d     K u r a p i k a ✨✨
attributes.review: This app is the definition of BS! it killed my family, gave me foot fungus😎🧚🏻‍♀️✨ the all also give me nightmares because a pedo suddenly popped up on my screen😭😭I also have a fear of the color orange that almost gave me a heart attack😖obama please come back🥺 Trump 2020🥰 But on a grave😤🙏🏻✨🧚🏻‍♀️❤️

attributes.title: Profanity or Crude Humor!!!!
attributes.review: Why would a presidential app have that listed as a reason for being 17+. I thought he always said he doesn’t say anything racist, inappropriate, or offensive. I guess the app doesn’t agree with him.

attributes.title: No ❤️
attributes.review:
I’m sorry but no sweetie this almost gave me a heart attack on the cover there is this orange looking man it scared me half to death ugh I’m 98 years old take that ugly man off of the cover                                         🧚🏼‍♀️ you tried 🧚🏼‍♀️ just next time don’t 🧚🏼‍♀️
Love ya not xoxo 👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩

attributes.title: Worst app and worst president
attributes.review: App doesn’t function, freezes and crashes and have my phone a virus. President Trump won’t even win the 2020 election so don’t waste your time trying to use this junk.

attributes.title: Tummy tickles
attributes.review: Every time I open this app my tummy tickles and it feels so bad it feels like I’m getting impaled by three different swords on three different occasion on three different days on three different years on the same day!!!
